name: CJ Scarlet
what_you_do: CJ Scarlet is a kid safety crusader and award-winning author focused on protecting children from victimization through education and advocacy. She offers online courses and resources to empower parents and children to avoid dangerous situations.
who_you_serve: CJ serves parents, guardians, and communities interested in child safety and empowerment, particularly those concerned about bullying, abuse, and trafficking.
signature_programs: Heroic Parenting 101 online course, Heroic Kids Safety Game app
current_projects: Heroic Parenting 101 online course, Heroic Kids Safety Game app
bio: Award-winning author, featured on MSNBC, PBS & NPR, developed the first statewide victim notification system in the U.S.
business_focus: CJ Scarlet is a kid safety crusader and award-winning author focused on protecting children from victimization through education and advocacy. She offers online courses and resources to empower parents and children to avoid dangerous situations. (child safety)
